name: Red Сlouds
description:
Browser may freeze when finished downloads, it's ok, Just wait

Html 5 may slow down or not run. Recommended executable application

FireFox not supported

Made for Godot Wild Jam 55, Theme: Dreams

The nightmare has crept into your dream of clouds and hares. Recycle sheep into clouds while avoiding explosive hares 

Control:

 A/D or Arrows to Move

 Space to Jump

 S/Down Arrow to fall from cloud

Credits:

Music:

Yubatake - https://opengameart.org/content/lullaby-1

iletzy - https://opengameart.org/content/creepy-lullaby-short

Fato Shadow - https://opengameart.org/content/bloody-sword-soundtrack
